EmailTemplate.subject: Here's the download you requested.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading Hello, {{Lead.First Name}},
Your use case “DevOps cloud for financial services” is ready to download.
Read the use case to learn how the Nokia overlay cloud solution has been successfully applied across multiple implementations. Then let Nokia show you how to provide a global DevOps cloud that supports the latest tools that your developers crave. Download use case <[[https://networks.nokia.com/use-case/financial-services/devops-cloud]]> © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
